en: Oh really, hm? Let me get this straight.
You need the day off in a couple of weeks to "go to an appointment," huh?
I'm not going to say no, but I'm docking your pay. You've been doing a real lackluster job around here, and now you're trying to take off on a day we have a big company meeting?
Nuh-uh. Either get your act together or just walk away.
